snippet.title: Spacewar! -  PDP-1 - One of the First Video Games (MIT 1962)
snippet.description:
Spacewar! - PDP-1 - One of the first video games. You can slingshot around to read, watch, listen and play the history of Spacewar! at my video game history website The Dot Eaters: https://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=bitstory-article-1/spacewar

We also fill the black hole of information on Space Wars, an arcade version of Spacewar! by Cinematronics: https://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=bitstory-article-2/space-wars-and-cinematronics

Made by Steve Russell on a PDP-1 minicomputer at MIT, Spacewar! is one of the first video games, in fact the first fully interactive video game. It was designed to show off the power of the PDP-1, entertain fellow students, and get the chicks! (2 out of 3 ain't bad)

Facebook 🕹️ https://www.facebook.com/thedoteaters
Twitter 🕹️  https://twitter.com/doteaters
YouTube 🕹️ https://www.youtube.com/user/Umma6umma
Pinterest 🕹️ https://www.pinterest.com/thedoteaters/

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
